official_title: Resolves that the House has heard with profound sorrow of the death of the Honorable Charles M. Teague, a Representative from the State of California. Resolves that the Clerk communicate these resolutions to the Senate and transmit a copy thereof to the family of the deceased. Resolves that as a further mark of respect the House do now adjourn.

summary.text: States that the House has heard with profound sorrow of the death of the Honorable Charles M. Teague, a Representative from the State of California. Directs the Clerk to communicate these resolutions to the Senate and transmit a copy to the family of the deceased. Provides that as a further mark of respect the House adjourn.

titles.title: Resolves that the House has heard with profound sorrow of the death of the Honorable Charles M. Teague, a Representative from the State of California. Resolves that the Clerk communicate these resolutions to the Senate and transmit a copy thereof to the family of the deceased. Resolves that as a further mark of respect the House do now adjourn.
